trans-unit.source: Specifies where a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object is placed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定在哪里<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref>对象放入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The TableRowSection enumeration specifies whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> object is placed in the body, header, or footer of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: TableRowSection 枚举指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>对象放入正文、 页眉或页脚<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: The TableRowSection enumeration represents the possible values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.TableSection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: TableRowSection 枚举表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.TableSection%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.TableSection%2A>的可能值

trans-unit.source: The TableRowSection enumeration enables you to build accessible Web sites using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control by adding the `thead`, `tbody`, and `tfoot` elements to the HTML that is rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: TableRowSection 枚举使您能够生成可访问的网站使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件通过添加`thead`， `tbody`，和`tfoot`到客户端呈现的 html 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: If all rows in a table are in the `tbody` element, the section information is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果表中的所有行都都在`tbody`元素，则不会呈现部分信息。

trans-unit.source: At least one row must be in a non-body element.
trans-unit.target: 在非 body 元素中必须至少有一行。

trans-unit.source: When using the declarative syntax, the sections must be in the following order: header, body, and then footer.
trans-unit.target: 使用声明性语法时，部分必须按以下顺序︰ 标头、 正文和页脚。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> is placed in the body of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> is placed in the footer of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> is placed in the header of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>.
